aka: El juego de las 100 velas: La última posesión
this_title: The 100 Candles Game: The Last Possession
trans_title: El juego de las 100 velas: La última posesión
introduction: A team of influencer bloggers decides to hold a ritual at the mansion of the "black countess". A fan of the supernatural, she disappeared without a trace after she was offered to play a game that was supposed to take her to another dimension. By evoking the spirit of the Countess, bloggers let otherworldly forces into the world. The one who can bring the demons back will survive.
foreign_title: The 100 Candles Game: The Last Possession
